But they got the job done for the price. Colors were cute and I would recommend these for someone who wants rings but doesn’t want to drop bank on them
Came exactly as pictured you can adjust the ring to your fitting. My daughter loved these. Doesn’t make finger turn green.

They are cute but they are bad quality, they turned my fingers green and some of them broke in half
cheap metal, was literally broken in the package
This set of rings is really pretty. Very delicate but eye catching. They fit comfortably but have shown some wear to the finish after a few months time. Nice quality for the price.
all of the rings except the star one turned me green.
They all fit my fingers nicely and are cute as well. Are great additions to my ring collection and I can't wait to style them.

评论概述: Cute rings at a great price
评论详情: I like this set of rings because they look nice on any finger.  They are adjustable so I will switch it around depending on my mood.  The rings themselves aren't high quality, but they were reasonably priced so I wasn't expecting much.  Some designs are better than others, so I pick and choose my favorites.  These are best for little girls or small fingers.  I found that if they need to be adjusted larger, it kind of pinches the skin between.  The rings are a little heavier than I'm used to and aren't comfortable enough to wear for days at a time, but it's a cute set for the occasion change in my jewelry.  My teenage daughter has borrowed a few to also wear and she loves them because it's stylish, she says.
My daughter is obsessed Cutest Chic Variety Affordable Doesn’t turn your skin green And trendy for teens
